topic.title: SIMÓN BOLÍVAR (1783–1830)
topic.body:
[A STATE TOO EXTENSIVE IN ITSELF ULTIMATELY FALLS INTO DECAY](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DrTbQH8Rzt278Fnn9vV7FET3zsprumQyx/?Topic:1_1DboDBy3cRFeNzTsURFgABreKgwP1Y4N4q/test)

if you like [politics](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FBmzopHQVRmhXPMBgGbg7X1ipUhfMvBRR) in general or [collectivization](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LzriSoCv1vV4RLz63HrNFd3nrw9hBAP3K/?Topic:1_1DboDBy3cRFeNzTsURFgABreKgwP1Y4N4q/test)  in particular join the talk or seed
